name: Best Friends (itch)
description:
Hello!

This is my First Visual Novel and I hope you like it.

Best Friends

"What have I ever done to them, to deserve this?"

"There are three friends: Sakura, Len and Hirana. Sakura would never BETRAY her friends. But what if her friends betrayed her?"

Characters

Sakura

Sakura always wanted to be a doctor! She has a pure heart and will never betray her friends.

Len

Len is kind to Sakura, But he kept a very dark secret.


Hirana

Hirana is kind to Sakura and Len, but she did something to Sakura that Sakura would never forget.
